docs.title: Sample API Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the Sample API Documentation. This API provides a simple Express-based interface hosted at https://sample-api-pzv2.onrender.com.

docs.title: Sections
docs.text:
• API Endpoints: Details on available API endpoints.
  • Setup Guide: Instructions for setting up and running the API.
  • Testing: How to test the API using tools like Jest.
  • Deployment: Deploying the API on Render.

docs.title: Steps
docs.text: 1. Push your code to GitHub: ```bash git push origin main

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: A simple Express API hosted at https://sample-api-pzv2.onrender.com.

docs.title: GET /
docs.text:
• Description: Returns a welcome message.
  • Response: 200 OK ```json "Hello from my sample API!"

docs.title: GET /users
docs.text:
• Description: Returns a list of users (placeholder).
  • Response: 200 OK ```json [{ "id": 1, "name": "John Doe" }]

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: 1. Clone the repository: ```bash git clone https://github.com/sumanlatamalik/sample-api.git cd sample-api

docs.title: Using Jest
docs.text: 1. Install Jest and Supertest: ```bash npm install --save-dev jest supertest
